_doc.description: FigmaOrganizer rules file. Load this in the Edit tab → Preview → Apply to Figma.
how_to_get_node_ids: Option 1 — Export tab: download the page JSON, find the node's 'id' field.
Option 2 — Figma: right-click a node → Copy/Paste as → Copy link. The URL contains '?node-id=12-32', replace the dash with colon → '12:32'.

sections.rename: Renames any node to the given name. Works on any node type.
sections.makeComponent: Converts a FRAME or GROUP into a Figma COMPONENT. Children are moved into the new component. The original node is replaced.
sections.addSafeArea: Inserts a transparent fullscreen child FRAME named 'safearea' inside the target FRAME or COMPONENT. All existing children are moved into it. No padding is changed — the safearea frame is purely a structural wrapper you style yourself.

rename._how: Set 'id' to the node's Figma ID and 'name' to the desired new name.
rename.name: btn_primary_default

makeComponent._how: Set 'id' to a FRAME or GROUP node. It will be replaced by a COMPONENT that contains the same children.

addSafeArea._how: Set 'id' to a FRAME or COMPONENT. A new transparent child frame named 'safearea' will be created at x:0 y:0 with the same width/height as the parent. All existing children are moved into it.
